memory



C_ALIGNMENT

#define C_ALIGNMENT 8
type: C preprocessor definition
description: default value of memory alignment

c_pointer_add

void *c_pointer_add(void *p, size_t x);
type: C function
description: add x to pointer

c_pointer_subtract

void *c_pointer_subtract(void *p, size_t x);
type: C function
description: subtract x to pointer

gc_core_memory_size

extern const size_t gc_core_memory_size;
type: C variable
description: size of memory (if 0, use system allocation)

c_memory_system_alloc

void *c_memory_system_alloc(size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: malloc

c_memory_system_free

void  c_memory_system_free(void *pointer);
type: C function
description: free

c_memory_system_realloc

void *c_memory_system_realloc(void *pointer, size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: realloc

c_memory_init

void  c_memory_init(void);
type: C function
description: initialize core memory,
if gc_core_memory_size == 0, malloc will be used for memory allocation
if gc_core_memory_size > 0, core memory is allocated once and allocations handled by random access allocator

c_memory_end

void  c_memory_end(void);
type: C function
description: terminate core memory
if gc_core_memory_size > 0, core memory is freed

c_memory_alloc

void *c_memory_alloc(size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: allocate on core memory

c_memory_free

void  c_memory_free(void *pointer);
type: C function
description: free memory allocated with c_memory_alloc or c_memory_realloc

c_memory_realloc

void *c_memory_realloc(void *pointer, size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: reallocate memory, null pointer is valid

c_memory_debug_alloc

void *c_memory_debug_alloc(size_t size, size_t alignment, char *filename, uint line);
type: C function
description: debug allocate on core memory

c_memory_debug_free

void  c_memory_debug_free(void *pointer, char *filename, uint line);
type: C function
description: debug free

c_memory_debug_realloc

void *c_memory_debug_realloc(void *pointer, size_t size, size_t alignment, char *filename, uint line);
type: C function
description: debug realloc

c_memory_debug_print

void  c_memory_debug_print(bool live_allocs);
type: C function
description: print all debug allocation data, can be restricted to live allocations

c_memory_debug

bool  c_memory_debug(void);
type: C function
description: check that all current allocation are valid (no overshoot)

c_alloc

#define c_alloc(s, a) c_memory_debug_alloc(s, a, __FILENAME__, __LINE__)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: debug allocate with core allocator

c_free

#define c_free(p) c_memory_debug_free(p, __FILENAME__, __LINE__)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: debug free with core allocator

c_realloc

#define c_realloc(p, s, a) c_memory_debug_realloc(p, s, a, __FILENAME__, __LINE__)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: debug realloc with core allocator

c_alloc

#define c_alloc(s, a) c_memory_alloc(s, a)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: allocate with core allocator

c_free

#define c_free(p) c_memory_free(p)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: free with core allocator

c_realloc

#define c_realloc(p, s, a) c_memory_realloc(p, s, a)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: realloc with core allocator

c_alloc_type

#define c_alloc_type(type) (type*)c_alloc(sizeof(type), __alignof(type))
type: C preprocessor definition
description: allocate memory for type using core allocator

c_alloc_type_array

#define c_alloc_type_array(type, size) (type*)c_alloc(size * sizeof(type), __alignof(type))
type: C preprocessor definition
description: allocate memory for type array using core allocator

MemoryFrame

typedef void MemoryFrame;
type: C typedef
description: used for allocations that will be freed as a block

c_memory_frame_create

MemoryFrame *c_memory_frame_create(size_t size);
type: C function
description: create a memory frame

c_memory_frame_delete

void  c_memory_frame_delete(MemoryFrame *frame);
type: C function
description: delete memory frame

c_memory_frame_alloc

void *c_memory_frame_alloc(MemoryFrame *frame, size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: allocate on memory frame

c_memory_frame_clear

void  c_memory_frame_clear(MemoryFrame *frame);
type: C function
description: clear allocations on memory frame

c_memory_frame_can_allocate

bool  c_memory_frame_can_allocate(MemoryFrame *frame, size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: check if allocation can be made on memory frame

MemoryStack

typedef void MemoryStack;
type: C typedef
description: stack-based allocations, last allocated will be first freed

c_memory_stack_create

MemoryStack *c_memory_stack_create(size_t size);
type: C function
description: create a memory stack

c_memory_stack_delete

void  c_memory_stack_delete(MemoryStack *stack);
type: C function
description: delete memory stack

c_memory_stack_alloc

void *c_memory_stack_alloc(MemoryStack *stack, size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: allocate on memory stack

c_memory_stack_free

void  c_memory_stack_free(MemoryStack *stack, void *pointer);
type: C function
description: free allocation on memory stack WARNING must be the last allocation

c_memory_stack_clear

void  c_memory_stack_clear(MemoryFrame *stack);
type: C function
description: clear allocations on memory stack

c_memory_stack_can_allocate

bool  c_memory_stack_can_allocate(MemoryFrame *stack, size_t size, size_t alignment);
type: C function
description: check if allocation can be made on memory stack

MemoryPool

typedef void MemoryPool;
type: C typedef
description: allocate pool for a fixed size allocations

c_memory_pool_create

MemoryPool *c_memory_pool_create(size_t object_size, size_t object_alignment, size_t capacity);
type: C function
description: create a memory pool

c_memory_pool_delete

void  c_memory_pool_delete(MemoryPool *pool);
type: C function
description: delete memory pool

c_memory_pool_alloc

void *c_memory_pool_alloc(MemoryPool *pool);
type: C function
description: allocate on memory pool (size determined when creating pool)

c_memory_pool_free

void  c_memory_pool_free(MemoryPool *pool, void *pointer);
type: C function
description: free allocation on memory pool

c_memory_pool_clear

void  c_memory_pool_clear(MemoryPool *pool);
type: C function
description: clear allocations on memory pool

c_memory_pool_can_allocate

bool  c_memory_pool_can_allocate(MemoryPool *pool);
type: C function
description: check if allocation can be made on memory pool
